key.name: widget-size
key.summary: Size of the image widget in pixels
key.description: Controls the width and height of the desktop image widget.

key.name: widget-position-x
key.summary: X position of the image widget
key.description: Sets the horizontal position of the desktop image widget.

key.name: widget-position-y
key.summary: Y position of the image widget
key.description: Sets the vertical position of the desktop image widget.

key.name: image-path
key.description: Specifies the file path of the image to be displayed on the desktop.

key.name: widget-timeout
key.description: Defines the interval in seconds for updating the image displayed on the desktop.

key.name: widget-corner-radius
key.summary: Corner radius of the image widget
key.description: Sets the corner radius for the desktop image widget, giving it rounded corners.
